summary.para: The DVD_PLAYBACK_LOCATION structure indicates DVD playback location.

remarks.para: TitleNum and ChapterNum or TitleNum and TimeCode are sufficient to save the playback location for simple linear movies.

summary.para: Title number for the whole disc; Title Track Number (TTN) not Video Title Set_Title Track Number (VTS_TTN).
Part-of-title number with title. 0xffffffff if not a simple linear movie.
Timecode. Use for current playback time. 0xFFFFFFFF if not a simple linear movie.
